message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's truly a game-changer in its field and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $15,000 for this exceptional item.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. While I agree the product looks great, the price is a little high for me right now. I'd be willing to pay $8,000 for it.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your interest in our product. To better align with your budget while still reflecting the value of the product, I am willing to negotiate at $10,000. This price reflects a fair compromise considering both the product's quality and your financial situation.
